org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.data.elasticsearch

类 ElasticsearchRepositoriesAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.data.elasticsearch.ElasticsearchRepositoriesAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @ConditionalOnClass(value={<error>,<error>})
 @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="spring.data.elasticsearch.repositories",
                       name="enabled",
                       havingValue="true",
                       matchIfMissing=true)
 @ConditionalOnMissingBean(value=<error>)
 @Import(value=org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.data.elasticsearch.ElasticsearchRepositoriesRegistrar.class)
public class ElasticsearchRepositoriesAutoConfiguration
extends Object
    Auto-configuration for Spring Data's Elasticsearch Repositories.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.1.0
    另请参阅:
    EnableElasticsearchRepositories
